body:
Hello everyone,

I am trying to import an 3D Office room, which I created in
Autocad 3D Civil 2008. I have the file in the DXF format, but when
I tried to import it to MAYA on MAC OS X.. It crashed.

Anyone with a solution for this problem.

Thank you

G V Deepak.

Graduate Research Assistant
M. E. Rinker, Sr. School of Building Construction
University Of Florida
subject: [Radiance-general] Problem Importing DXF into Maya on Mac OS X
